word:
"If there be therefore any consolation in Christ, if any comfort of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any bowels and mercies, fulfill ye my joy, that ye be like-minded, having the same love, being of one accord, of 
                                                                           275
one mind. Let nothing be done through strife or vain-glory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.
